translations.translation: Warning: your service expires before the withdrawal date. You must renew your service manually in order to activate automatic renewal.
In order to manage the payment methods used with your automatic renewal, click here.
In order to manage the renewal of your services, click here.
The migration of existing products towards the new automatic renewal engine will be offered soon.
In order to finalize the activation of the automatic renewal, please add a new payment method so that you will be able to choose your withdrawal date.
What do you want to do?
Cancel my request to terminate the service: {0}
Authorise automatic renewal on designated services
If you automatically renew any of your services, you may choose a renewal day.
Automatic renewals will only work if a renewal day is selected.
Do you need help renewing your services?
Automatic renewal has been activated on the designated service (s) and on your account.
You have selected automatic renewal for at least one service but we were unable to enable automatic renewal on your account: {0}
Reversing the cancellation of a service
Service {0} will be automatically cancelled on {1}.
Data linked to the automatic payment of your services will be irreversibly deleted. You will be able to reverse this decision up to 24 hours before the expiry date.
Do you wish to reverse the cancellation of service {0}?

Choose your preferred type of renewal(automatic or manual).
For automatic renewal, you can also choose the withdrawal frequency.
You do not have the right to change this data
This service has already been renewed and cannot be undone.
Renewal is managed directly in your service
An error has occurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
The automatic payment of your {0} service will be disabled.

To keep using your service, you must make your next payment before the expiry date.
Failing which, your service will be automatically cancelled on its expiry date, {0}. All data linked to the automatic payment of your services will be irreversibly deleted.
You can reactivate automatic payment up to 24 jours before the expiry date.
You will not receive any email reminder informing you that your service is ending.
Automatic renewal for your {0} service will be activated.
Your service will be automatically renewed on {0}.
You will be able to set payment frequency.
If you delete the MX Plan all the associated data will be permanently deleted. You will not get a refund if you delete the MX Plan.
You cannot delete your email account because it is linked to a hosting package.
You will get an email containing the procedure to close your MX Plan so you can confirm its immediate deletion.
We have processed your MX Plan deletion request. We will send you an email containing the cancellation procedure.
There was an error when you requested to close your MX Plan:
Do you want to enable automatic renewal for the designated services?
Automatic renewal has been successfully activated for the designated services.
You have at least one service in automatic renewal but you have not yet authorised this option.
Automatic payment for all of your domain names will only be disabled if you are the billing contact.
To keep using your services, you must make your next payments before their expiry date.
Failing which, your services will be automatically cancelled on their expiry date. All data linked to the automatic payment of your services will be irreversibly deleted.
You can reactivate automatic payment for your services up to 24 days before they expire.
Your request to disable automatic payment has been processed. It will take effect in a few hours.
An error has occurred while loading the information
See the order in HTML format
See the order in PDF format
See the invoice in HTML format
See the invoice in PDF format
You have no invoices for the month selected
An error has occurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
The following list shows payments that were made with your default payment method. Each of these payments can include one or several invoices.
You have no payment for the selected period.
You do not have any orders
There is no order matching this criteria:
An error occurred while retrieving this order
Search for my orders by customer ID.
Withdrawal of the service(s) from the order
Do you really want to cancel order {0}?
Yes, I want to cancel that order.

You have a right of withdrawal for a period of 14 days, starting on the date of the order. In the event of withdrawal, you will receive a refund - within 30 days from the withdrawal - for the money originally paid, minus the days of service usage on a prorate basis.
Warning: withdrawal done through this form is valid for all products associated with this order. Withdrawal is effective immediately.

Confirmation will result in the automatic and irreversible deletion of all data associated with this order (including backups). Before you continue and confirm your withdrawal, it is your responsibility to take all necessary measures for the safekeeping of your data and the continuity of your activities. OVH assumes no responsibility in that regard.
An error has occurred during the cancellation of your order.
You don't have any credits for the selected period.
Some movements are not displayed due to an error, but the credit will not be affected.
You don't have a prepaid account
You don't have any activity on your prepaid account for the selected month
An error has occurred. Unable to display the information.
Due to an error the operation has not been carried out.

You can begin transferring a chosen amount from your OVH customer account to a bank account. Please note that you can only transfer amounts from returns and refunds (e.g. commercial gestures) from OVH.
Your request has been processed. To validate the purchase order, click here.
from your prepaid account to your bank account
Click "Settle" to open the purchase order. Your browser must allow pop-ups.
You will be alerted by e-mail when your account balance falls below the alert threshold.
Disable balance alerts on your account:
Your alert could not be registered due to a problem.
Please enter a positive whole number
An error occurred while loading the page
You don't have any saved payment methods.
This action is not supported for your country.
I want to choose this as my default payment method as soon as it gets validated.
by using an already existing contact
By default, only mandatory fields (marked with an asterisk) are displayed. Use the button placed at the beginning of each section to display all fields you can fill in.
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
My country is not on this list
An error occured when modifying the description:
An error has occurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Unable to retrieve the available payment methods
More actions for this payment method
Warning: you are about to permanently delete the payment method linked to the PayPal account:
Warning: you are about to permanently delete the payment method linked to card number:
There must be at least 5 characters.
The text must be fewer than 255 characters.
An error occured while deleting the payment method
An error occurred while modifying payment method
By clicking on the "Add" button, you can log in to your PayPal account and allow OVH to debit your PayPal account when you receive your next bills.

To check that your card is registered, we will try to take a payment.
Please note that we will not withdraw any money, once we receive confirmation from your bank.
Your bank card will be enabled immediately.

When OVH requests debit authorisation it may appear that there has been a change in your account balance. However in reality OVH will not debit your account and nothing will appear on your bank statement.

By clicking on the "Add" button, a document will be downloaded.
Please follow the procedure as described in the document in order to validate the payment method. Your bank account will be validated within 24 to 48 hours from the moment the direct debit authorization has been received.
An error occured while adding the payment method
Procedure to be returned by mail
Click here to finish registering your payment method.
The bank account has been added and will be activated once validated. Please follow the procedure described in this document to validate the payment method to be sent my mail.
You added a bank account through your customer control panel. We are currently waiting for you to send us by mail your direct debit approval on that account.
Votre compte bancaire sera validé dans les 24h à 48h à compter de la réception de votre autorisation de prélèvement.
Use this automatic payment method by default.
You can credit your account to pay your invoices, or to pay in advance for future invoices.
The amount of credit must be less than 10 {0} and your account balance must be positive.
The amount entered is incorrect. Please only use numbers separated by a period or a comma.
An error has occurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Your (order # {1}) credit will be effective on your prepaid account as soon as your payment has been received.
An error occurred while retrieving the list of your accounts
There is no account to display
My phone usage monitoring from {0} to {1}
Select a group for more information
An error occurred while loading the information
My phone usage for previous months
An error occurred while loading the information
You can credit your account to pay your bills, or to pay the next bills in advance. (1 point = 0,01 {0} excl. taxes)
The amount entered is incorrect. Please use numbers only.
The amount of credit must be at least {0} points.
The maximum amount of credit is {0} points.
An error occurred while loading the information
Your (order # {1}) credit will be effective on your prepaid account as soon as your payment has been received.
There are no items to display.
You do not have an active Loyalty account
There was an error retrieving information. Please retry using another method:
An error occured when requesting compensation:
Your compensation request has been registered and your compensation will be applied within the next few hours.
You are not entitled to any compensation.
Please see the compensation you are eligible for below. Click "Apply" to activate your compensation.
You will have until {0} to submit your compensation request, and receive the compensation you are entitled to in accordance with our SLAs
Your request has been received, and will be processed as soon as possible.
Your requests have been received, and will be processed as soon as possible.
To be renewed in a month
Do you want to receive this email?
We have processed your requested to delete your hosting packing. We will send you an email containing the procedure to take.
Unable to close your web hosting package due to the following error:
When a web hosting package is deleted, all the data linked to it is lost. No refund will be granted for a deleted web hosting package.
You will get an email containing the procedure for closing your hosting package so you can confirm its immediate deletion.
Your {0} credit has been generated; you can proceed with your order.
You cannot use direct debit to renew your services.
An amount of {0} will be withdrawn from your default payment method.
An amount of {0} is due for the renewal of your services.
You have not specified a default payment method.
Your default payment method is no longer valid.
This action will generate a purchase order so you can immediately settle an amount. This purchase order will be valid for one hour.
The purchase order{0} has been generated for a total of {2}.
The purchase order{0} has been generated so that you can pay your balance.
An error has occurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
See the invoice {0} in a new window.
See the order {0} in a new window.
Voir les détails pour cette dette {0}.
An error occurred while retrieving your account balance.
An error occurred while retrieving your account details.
An error occurred while retrieving the details of line {0}.
An error has occurred during the extraction of your payment method.
An error occurred while retrieving the history of operations.
List of operations on the invoice
Opening the order associated with this operation in a new window.
See the invoice in HMTL version (new window).
See the invoice in PDF version (new window).
Automatic withdrawal on a credit card
Automatic withdrawal from a PayPal account
Automatic withdrawal from a bank account
Automatic withdrawal from a prepaid OVH account
Reimbursement through a prepaid OVH account
Cancellation of a deposit through the OVH prepaid account

The service will be cancelled when you give your confirmation. Once you do this, all data associated with this service (including any backups) will be permanently deleted, immediately and automatically. Before initiating the process and giving your confirmation, you are responsible for taking all of the necessary measures to store your personal data. OVH cannot accept any liability in this regard.
I am not using this service anymore
I am using another OVH service
I am using a competing service
The service is not reliable enough
Would you like to provide more details, or give a suggestion?
Sorry, an error has occurred while loading the page.
An error has occurred while confirming your service cancellation.
You have successfully cancelled your services. A confirmation email will be sent to you in the next few minutes. If you have any queries, please feel free to contact our support team.
You do not have a credit account
An error has occurred loading your credit accounts.
Details of operations on your credit account {0}
An error has occurred loading operations on your credit account.
